name: OCKTaskStore
desc: A store that performs read/write operations on a task data type.

items.name: func addTask(Self.Task, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<Self.Task>?)
items.desc: Adds a task asynchronously to the store.

items.name: func addTasks([Self.Task], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[Self.Task]>?)
items.desc: Adds an array of tasks asynchronously to the store.

items.name: func updateTask(Self.Task, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<Self.Task>?)
items.desc: Updates a task asynchronously in the store.

items.name: func updateTasks([Self.Task], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[Self.Task]>?)
items.desc: Updates an array of tasks asynchronously in the store.

items.name: func deleteTask(Self.Task, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<Self.Task>?)
items.desc: Deletes a task asynchronously from the store.

items.name: func deleteTasks([Self.Task], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[Self.Task]>?)
items.desc: Deletes an array of tasks asynchronously from the store.
